title: Stronger Growth, With Caveats, Is Predicted for Global Economy
first_paragraph: Top economic policymakers and business leaders from around the world made fairly upbeat predictions for global economic growth this year at the World Economic Forum on Friday, but cautioned that already low interest rates meant there was limited room to respond if new problems arose.
